Notification management made easy: 通知管理变得简单易用
\n To obtain a token:\n\n 1. Log in to:
To obtain a token:

  1. Log in to your Ntfy instance.
  2. Click on Account
  3. Go under, on Access tokens and click on the button icon to copy your Token or CREATE ACCESS TOKEN if you do not have
  4. Please pay attention to the expiration time when copying/creating a Token.
  4. Copy your access token & and paste them into the fields below.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: 将一个自定义 API 调用到一个特定的终点
Title: 标题
The topic/channel to send the notificati: 发送通知的主题/频道，例如测试1
通知的优先顺序(1-5)，1是最低优先顺序。
Add Action buttons to notifications, see: 将动作按钮添加到通知中，见 https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#action-butons
You can define which URL to open when a: 您可以定义点击通知时要打开哪个URL，见 https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#click-action
Let ntfy send messages at a later date,: Live ntfy sent message at a later date ，例如 'clay, 10am', see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#scheduled-delivery
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
